contactInfo.address: 201 N. Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90012

checklist.name: Plot Plan/Site Plan
checklist.description: Detailed site plan showing building location, setbacks, parking, and site dimensions
checklist.notes: Must show all structures, driveways, and easements

checklist.name: Architectural Plans (Floor, Roof, Elevations)
checklist.description: Complete architectural drawings including floor plans, roof plan, and all elevations
checklist.notes: All plans must be drawn to scale with dimensions

checklist.name: Foundation and Structural Plans
checklist.notes: Must be stamped by California-licensed Structural Engineer

checklist.name: Soils/Geotechnical Report
checklist.description: Geotechnical investigation report for foundation design
checklist.notes: Required for all new construction and some major additions

checklist.name: Title 24 Energy Calculations
checklist.description: California Energy Code compliance calculations and forms
checklist.notes: Must include CF-1R and CF-2R forms registered with CEC

checklist.name: CalGreen Checklist
checklist.description: California Green Building Standards Code compliance checklist
checklist.notes: Mandatory and voluntary measures must be identified

checklist.name: Electrical Plans
checklist.description: Electrical system plans showing service, panels, circuits, and devices
checklist.notes: Can be prepared by licensed electrician or engineer

checklist.name: Plumbing Plans
checklist.description: Plumbing system layout including water supply and drainage
checklist.notes: Show all fixtures, pipe sizes, and water heater location

checklist.name: Mechanical Plans
checklist.description: HVAC system plans and equipment specifications
checklist.notes: Include Manual J load calculations for residential projects

checklist.name: Grading and Drainage Plans
checklist.description: Site grading, drainage, and erosion control plans
checklist.notes: Required if site work exceeds 50 cubic yards

checklist.name: CEQA Documentation
checklist.description: California Environmental Quality Act compliance documents
checklist.notes: Consult with Planning Department for CEQA clearance

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for projects that may have significant environmental impact

checklist.name: Historic Resource Assessment
checklist.description: Historic preservation review for properties 50+ years old
checklist.notes: Check with Office of Historic Resources

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for buildings built before 1974 in certain areas

checklist.name: Traffic Study
checklist.description: Traffic impact analysis for large developments

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for projects generating significant traffic (typically 100+ trips/day)

fees.calculationMethod: Based on valuation using Building Valuation Data table
